data.lyric:
[ti:Perfect]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:÷ (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Perfect - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)
[00:01.32]Written by：Ed Sheeran/Matthew Sheeran
[00:02.65]I found a love for me
[00:08.48]
[00:10.65]Darling just dive right in and follow my lead
[00:16.13]
[00:18.23]Well I found a girl beautiful and sweet
[00:24.17]
[00:25.75]OhI never knew you were the someone waiting for me
[00:32.66]Cause we were just kids when we fell in love
[00:36.96]Not knowing what it was I will not give you up this time
[00:48.34]But darling just kiss me slow your heart is all I own
[00:55.41]
[00:55.91]And in your eyes you're holding mine
[01:01.38]
[01:02.74]Baby I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
[01:12.88]
[01:14.14]Barefoot on the grass listening to our favourite song
[01:21.20]When you said you looked a mess I whispered underneath my breath
[01:28.40]But you heard it darling you look perfect tonight
[01:35.09]
[01:41.77]Well I found a woman stronger than anyone I know
[01:48.16]
[01:49.05]She shares my dreams I hope that someday I'll share her home
[01:56.79]I found a love to carry more than just my secrets
[02:03.85]
[02:04.81]To carry love to carry children of our own
[02:11.23]We are still kids but we're so in love fighting against all odds
[02:19.31]I know we'll be alright this time
[02:26.40]
[02:27.08]Darling just hold my hand be my girl I'll be your man
[02:34.39]I see my future in your eyes
[02:40.24]
[02:41.27]Baby I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
[02:51.30]
[02:52.64]Barefoot on the grass listening to our favourite song
[02:59.46]When I saw you in that dress looking so beautiful
[03:05.34]I don't deserve this darling you look perfect tonight
[03:13.70]
[03:26.85]Baby I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
[03:36.66]
[03:37.94]Barefoot on the grass listening to our favourite song
[03:44.98]I have faith in what I see
[03:48.37]Now I know I have met an angel in person
[03:54.74]And she looks perfect I don't deserve this
[04:02.46]You look perfect tonight
data.trans:
[ti:Perfect]
[ar:Ed Sheeran]
[al:÷ (Deluxe)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.32]//
[00:02.65]我找到属于我的爱
[00:08.40]
[00:10.65]亲爱的 就坠入爱中 跟着我来
[00:16.13]
[00:18.23]我寻得这么一个女孩 漂亮窝心让人爱
[00:24.17]
[00:25.75]我从没想过你就是那个为我等候着的人
[00:32.66]因为沦陷爱河时我们像是单纯的孩子
[00:36.96]不知道未来将会是怎样 这一次我不会放弃你
[00:48.34]亲爱的 温柔吻我吧 你的真心就是我的所有
[00:55.41]
[00:55.91]在你眼里 你拥有我的真心
[01:01.38]
[01:02.74]亲爱的 夜幕中你在我怀里翩然起舞
[01:12.88]
[01:14.14]光着脚丫踩在草地上 听着我们最爱的歌
[01:21.20]当你说自己狼狈不堪时 我在心底默默低语
[01:28.40]你会听到 亲爱的 今夜的你如此美丽
[01:35.09]
[01:41.77]你是我认识的女人中最坚强的一个
[01:48.16]
[01:49.05]你进入我的梦境 我希望有一天能给你一个家
[01:56.79]我意识到原来爱可以承载很多 不仅是我的秘密
[02:03.85]
[02:04.81]还有未来我们的孩子
[02:11.23]那么相爱的你我依然像个孩子般 对抗世俗追寻心中的梦
[02:19.31]我知道这一次 我们会安然无恙
[02:26.40]
[02:27.08]亲爱的 紧握我的手 女孩 我会专属于你
[02:34.39]在你眼里我看到了未来的无限可能
[02:40.24]
[02:41.27]亲爱的 夜幕中你在我怀里翩然起舞
[02:51.30]
[02:52.64]光着脚丫踩在草地上 听着我们最爱的歌
[02:59.46]一身裙装的你 是那么动人
[03:05.34]我如此幸运 亲爱的今夜的你如此美丽
[03:13.70]
[03:26.85]亲爱的 夜幕中你在我怀里翩然起舞
[03:36.66]
[03:37.94]光着脚丫踩在草地上 听着我们最爱的歌
[03:44.98]我坚信眼前的一切
[03:48.37]如今我知道我遇到了天使般的你
[03:54.74]你如此美丽 我如此幸运
[04:02.46]今夜的你如此美丽
